ending_rules.happy: escaped == true AND health > 0 AND clue < 100
ending_rules.hidden: escaped == true AND health > 0 AND clue == 100

prologue.description: 당신은 충북대학교 컴퓨터공학과 학생입니다. 기말대체 과제를 제출하지 못해 새벽에 E8-1 건물로 몰래 들어왔습니다.

conclusion.happy_condition: escaped == true AND health > 0 AND clue < 100
conclusion.hidden_condition: escaped == true AND health > 0 AND clue == 100
